scripts.yaml:exchanger: node ./create-yaml-file create-yaml --subgraph exchanger --env prod --universal-test-block null | mustache - mustache/yaml.mustache > subgraphs/Oikos-exchanger.yaml
scripts.codegen:oks: npm run prepare:oks && npm run codegen && npm run cleanup
scripts.codegen:rates: npm run prepare:rates && npm run codegen && npm run cleanup
scripts.codegen:exchanges: npm run prepare:exchanges && npm run codegen && npm run cleanup
scripts.deploy:oks: npm run prepare:oks && graph deploy oikos-cash/oikos --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug; npm run cleanup; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.deploy:rates: npm run prepare:rates && graph deploy --access-token 3073ececda1f4741ae4e7a6fcd7b6cd7  --product hosted-service oikos-cash/rates --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug; npm run cleanup;
scripts.deploy:exchanges: npm run prepare:exchanges && graph deploy oikos-cash/exchanges --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug; npm run cleanup; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.deploy:exchanger: npm run prepare:exchanger && graph deploy --access-token eabcf3cd658e4b76a935c68f4cea5263 oikos1/exchanger --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug; npm run cleanup; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.deploy:loans: npm run prepare:loans && graph deploy oikos-cash/loans --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug; npm run cleanup; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.deploy:loans-vbnb: graph deploy --access-token 3073ececda1f4741ae4e7a6fcd7b6cd7  --product hosted-service oikos-cash/loansVbnb --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug; npm run cleanup; exit $EXIT_CODE
